Licence Market stall licence

Apply for a market stall licence
from London Borough of Barnet

Step 2 of 4
  1. Submit application
  2. Email address
  3. Pay licence fee
  4. Done

3. Pay the licence fee

There is a fee of £500 to apply for this licence. You will be sent to our payment partner, World Pay, in order to pay it.

Continue to World Pay website
